name: Aishworya Aryal
say: This website has been a lifesaver for me. I've been able to talk about my mental health, and it has helped me immensely. I would highly recommend it to anyone struggling with their mental health.

name: Binod Poudel
say: This website has helped me a lot. I was able to talk anonymously with a counselor about mental health and became a lifesaver. Recommended for those suffering from mental health. If you find this helpful, please do show the link to those who you think needs some help

name: Miharika Acharya
say: This website has helped me immensely. I've been able to talk to a counselor anonymously about my mental health, and it has been a lifesaver for me. I would highly recommend it to anyone struggling with their mental health.
